unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Conditions for Two-sample T Procedures
question_text:
Which of the following statements is/are true regarding the following problem?
Two-sample $T$ procedures can only be used if
I. The samples are two independent SRSs. II. The sampling distribution of the difference is approximately normal. III. The sample sizes are each at least $30$.
